name: Peach and Ginger Chicken with Couscous
description: Couscous is a quick and easy side dish. For a flavour burst, add your favourite Epicure Herb & Spice blend, or Epicure Tea, when boiling couscous.
preparation: Cook chicken in frying pan over medium heat for 8 – 10 minutes, or until brown. Place on a plate and set aside.

Add enough water to peach juice to make 1⁄2 cup. Pour into pan, stir in cornstarch and ginger. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently for approximately 5 – 7 minutes, until thickened and bubbly. Stir for an additional minute.
Add peaches, chicken, Apple Pie Spice, and water chestnuts. Heat thoroughly and serve over couscous.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.
